ARABIC: ثُمَّ قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تُشْرِكُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then they will be asked, 'Where are those besides Allah you associated with Him?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will then be asked: "Where are they you took as partners
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It will then be said to them: “Where are those whom you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Then they will be asked, "Where are the idols which you worshipped besides God?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It will then be said to them, “Where are the partners you used to appoint?” –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then it will be said to them: "Where are (all) those whom you used to consider partners"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then shall it be said to them: Where is that which you used to set up
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then it is said to them, 'Where are those you associated, apart from God?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then it is said unto them: Where are (all) that ye used to make partners (in the Sovereignty)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and then they will be asked, "Where are those whom you associated [with God]?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then it will be said Unto them: where are those whom ye have been associating
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then they will be told, ‘Where are they whom you used to worship as deities
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then shall it be said to them: "Where are the (deities) to which ye gave part-worship-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then it will be said to them: "Where are (all) those whom you used to join in worship as partners
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It will then be asked of them: 'Where are those whom you associated,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then it will be said to them, “Where are those you used to deify?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then it will be said to them, "Where is that which you used to associate [with Him in worship]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:73] Then it will be said to them, in reproach: ‘Where are those whom you used to make partners,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then it is said unto them) then the angels of the Fire will say to them: (Where are (all) that ye used to make partners) where are those you used to worship
